title: Rollback app behavior to match Version 56 and label build as v56

requirements.text: Restore the application’s UI styling and layout to match Version 56 by removing/undoing the styling/layout changes introduced in later versions (notably Version 58+), ensuring a consistent neutral Shadcn/Tailwind look across the app shell and quiz-related screens (including PreGameQuestionCountView, PreQuizSummaryView, and QuizResults).

quotes: please return in version 56, as newer versions is ruined.

acceptanceCriteria: PreGameQuestionCountView, PreQuizSummaryView, and QuizResults use the same neutral Shadcn/Tailwind visual treatment (spacing, typography, surfaces, and borders) as the Version 56 baseline.
No new styling/layout regressions are introduced in the app shell and core quiz flow screens compared to the intended Version 56 look.

requirements.text: Restore Version 56 header navigation behavior so that the “Play” and “Edit” header actions are visible throughout the start flow and non-game views, and are hidden only while the user is actively in the in-game question-answering screen (the active quiz step).

quotes: please return in version 56, as newer versions is ruined.

acceptanceCriteria: When the user is in any non-question-answering view (e.g., editor, pre-game/start flow, results, wrong answers review), the header shows the Play action and (for admins) the Edit action.
While actively answering questions (the in-game question-answering screen), the header Play/Edit actions are hidden.
Switching between views reliably updates header visibility without requiring a page refresh.

requirements.text: Update the build/version identity shown in the UI to report Version 56 (e.g., the footer build version and any diagnostics build info), so the published build is clearly labeled as v56.

quotes: please return in version 56, as newer versions is ruined.

acceptanceCriteria: The build version displayed in the BuildIdentityFooter is "v56".
Any build version shown in deployment/diagnostics UI reflects "56" consistently for the same build.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo; add backend/migration.mo only if a state schema upgrade is required.
nonGoals: Adding new product features beyond restoring Version 56 look/behavior.
Introducing new backend services, databases, or external integrations.
